summary: A large fort player home with all you need
descriptionHtml:
A Large palace called Dragon\'s Peak with town,merchants and surrounding walls for the mighty Dovahkiin to live in a comfortable way

Any ideas for the castle interior would be useful as it\'ll be difficult to get the interior size looking similar to the exterior size. 

I\'m already going to add:
 -Master & guest bedrooms(Done) 
                                       -Throne room(Done)
                                       -Kitchen(Done)
                                       -Armory(Done)
                                       -Servants Quarters(Done)
                                       -Library(Done)
                                       -Mages quarters
                                       -Enchanting/alchemy room(Done)
                                       -Display room(Done)
                                       -Swimming pool(Done)
                                       -Vault(Done)
-Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary(Done)
-Chaple(Done)
 

Will also feature:
-Guard Barracks (Done)
-Guard living quarters (Done)
-Jail(needs re-doing)
-Blacksmith(Done)
-General Merchant (Done)
-Court Wizard(Done) 
-Guards (exterior,jail and barracks/living quarters done)
-Houses(Done) 
-Citizens(Done)
-Tailor(Done)
-Tavern(Done)
-Bards(Done)
-Street Merchants(Done)
-Temple(Done)
-Housecarls
-Other Followers
-Fences(Done)
-Nobles(Done-including a special reappearance from everyone\'s favorite dragon age dwarf Oghren)
-Farms(Done)


If anybody knows any mods which conflict with this one please tell me

CONFLICTING MODS
-Riftborg
-Build your own home
-Ranger Cabins
-Sovreign Castle
Steam Linkhttp://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79132705
 
Can anybody help me set up an arena or occasional attacks from stormcloaks or and imperials(where you select which faction as attacking at any one time) as I\'d like to put this in my next mod (for which this is a practice for

Credits Thanks to Locaster @ nexus for allowing me to use his great armor from Become King of Riverhelm
Link To Riverhelm http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20614/

Imma now on facebook so check out the page for new releases and constand updates
http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.125203524300904.25760.125195687635021&type=1
author: XOMICH
